verses.text: Amaziah \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w twenty-five|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H2568"\w* \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H2568"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w twenty-nine|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w His|strong="H8034"\w* mother’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jehoaddan|strong="H3086"\w*; \w she|strong="H6242"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wholeheartedly|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* soon \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w firmly|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w grasp|strong="H2388"\w*, Amaziah \w executed|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w murdered|strong="H2026"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* acted \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: “Fathers \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers; each \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* own \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* Amaziah \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w assigned|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H5975"\w* according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thousands \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* 300,000 chosen \w men|strong="H1121"\w* able \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w serve|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, bearing \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spear|strong="H7420"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w shield|strong="H6793"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3478"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* 100,000 \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H3603"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H3603"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*—\w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ephraimites.

\w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* go \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* bravely \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, God \w will|strong="H5826"\w* overthrow \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* enemy, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* overthrow.”

Amaziah \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w about|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* able \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w than|strong="H7235"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* Amaziah dismissed \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* \w who|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w sent|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3063"\w* \w were|strong="H3063"\w* \w furious|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* anger.

Amaziah, however, summoned \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w strength|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w led|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w Valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Salt|strong="H4417"\w*, where \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* 10,000 \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* army \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w captured|strong="H7617"\w* 10,000 \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*. \w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \w them|strong="H7617"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cliff|strong="H5553"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w them|strong="H7617"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* so \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w dashed|strong="H1234"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w pieces|strong="H1234"\w*.

Meanwhile \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* \w that|strong="H5892"\w* Amaziah \w had|strong="H3063"\w* dismissed \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w raided|strong="H6584"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* 3,000 \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w carried|strong="H3212"\w* \w off|strong="H6584"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deal|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* plunder.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* Amaziah returned \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Edomites|strong="H8165"\w*, \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w back|strong="H8165"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Seirites, \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* gods, \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* Amaziah, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* said, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*’s gods, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w could|strong="H5337"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?”

\w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Have|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w counselor|strong="H3289"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*? \w Stop|strong="H2308"\w*! \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w*?” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w stopped|strong="H2308"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w determined|strong="H3289"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heeded|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w advice|strong="H6098"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w Amaziah|strong="H3289"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w took|strong="H3478"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* word \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* Jehoash \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*. “\w Come|strong="H1980"\w*, \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*,” \w he|strong="H7971"\w* said.

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* Jehoash \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* replied \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Amaziah \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w thistle|strong="H2336"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cedar \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, saying, ‘\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* marriage.’ \w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w along|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w trampled|strong="H7429"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w thistle|strong="H2336"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* said, ‘\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* Edom,’ \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w become|strong="H5375"\w* \w proud|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* boastful. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* stir \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* \w so|strong="H6258"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*—\w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Amaziah would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* come \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jehoash, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* gods \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Edom.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* Jehoash \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* advanced, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Amaziah \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w faced|strong="H6440"\w* each other \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
